FuncDef: This command is used to explicitly define the marking of the DE bit forfcfc-nameaccording to the inplus-profile or in-profile and out-of-profile or exceed-profile status of the packet (fc-namemay be used to identify the dot1p value).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that this value is to be used for all the packets of this forwarding class regardless of their profile status. Values-0, 1.
